ref: 13739 sthaṇḍila n. ʻ bare open ground ʼ MBh., ʻ such ground prepared for performance of sacrifice ʼ ŚāṅkhBr., sthaṇḍilya -- n. ChUp.
Pa. thaṇḍila -- n. ʻ bare hard stony ground ʼ,
Pk. thaṁḍila -- , ˚illa -- , ṭhaṁḍilla -- n. ʻ clear land free from animals ʼ;
Or. thaṇḍiḷa ʻ sand altar for sacrifice ʼ;
G. ṭhãḍil n. ʻ spot prepared for sacrifice ʼ.
